extName.message: oneClipper - send mail to one Note

extDescription.message: Send Thunderbird emails to Microsoft OneNote with one click. Supports multiple accounts, custom organization & attachments.

give_access_to_oneclipper.message: Give access to oneClipper to insert clipped contents into oneNote

we_dont_read_any_files.message: We don't read any files inside onenote.
